title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.6 - Records required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.6 - Records required

State Regulations
(a) The methods followed in allocating joint expenses shall be described, kept and supported as set forth under "detail of allocation bases" (see section
109.4
[g], infra). (b) The effects of the application, to each operating expense classification of all bases of allocation shall be shown on records kept in clear and legible form. Such records shall be readily available for examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
106.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
